Name: Hybrid Flier
Actions: Multiattack. The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid. Javelin. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. Spit Acid. Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (4d4) acid damage.
